metadata.name: Secret Room Hint
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod gives you a hint in order to find secret / super secret / ultra secret rooms / crawlspaces / black markets more easily.
[h1]How it works[/h1] [b][u]Secret / Super Secret Rooms:[/u][/b] every time you enter a room, if there is a Secret / Super Secret Room entrance, you have 10% probability to see a new [b][u]light-blue[/u][/b] wisp (near the wall you should bomb).
[b][u]Ultra Secret Rooms:[/u][/b] every time you enter a room, if you have either a Red Key, a Craked Key or a Soul of Cain and there is a Ultra Secret Room near you (max 1-2 rooms distance), you have 10% probability to see a new [b][u]red[/u][/b] wisp.
[b][u]Crawlspaces / Black Markets:[/u][/b] every time you enter a room, if under a rock there is a trapdoor that leads to a crawlspace, you have 10% probability to see a new [b][u]purple[/u][/b] wisp. ^^^due to latest update these wisps do not spawn correctly. Sorry. New update with a fix asap
[b][u]Note[/u][/b]: every point of luck will increase the probability of seeing a wisp by 5%.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] [b]Repentance[/b] (tested) [b]Afterbirth+[/b] (NOT tested but it should work) [b]Afterbirth+[/b] for MAC OS (it does NOT work)
[b]Mod Config Menu[/b] - McM: you can disable/enable each type of wisps - McM: you can set the probability for the wisps (base and bonus probability) - McM: you can set the colour of the wisps!
[h1]Credits[/h1] I took part of the code from this [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2488298288&searchtext=secret+room+placeholder] mod [/url] made by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/DarkElias] HeliOS [/url].
